channel.title: AppArmor and latest whonix
channel.description: Hello , First of all thanks you for developing and maintaining whonix from long time !! Apparmor from tester repo is working fine without any issues on Vbox XFCE whonix both on gateway and workstation ? sudo apt-get install apparmor-profiles-hardened-debian , particularly if i install all profiles .. any weired problem or issues ? Regards

item.title: AppArmor and latest whonix
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi cry64691

Could you please use the forum search engine (top right hand corner of you screen) for keyword(s):

apparmor-profiles-hardened-debian

https://forums.whonix.org/search?expanded=true&q=apparmor-profiles-hardened-debian

If there was/is a know issue with apparmor install you will find it there. If you do find any new issues could you please report back?
